@@info: Here are translations that exist in <en> but not in <zh-Hant-TW>.
After editing this file, you can run 'flutter pub run slang apply --locale=zh-Hant-TW' to quickly apply the newly added translations.

apkPickerPage.title: 應用程式 (APK)
apkPickerPage.excludeAppsWithoutLaunchIntent: 排除不可啟動的應用程式

sendModeHelp.title: 傳輸模式
sendModeHelp.single: 單次傳輸檔案到設備. 選中的檔案在傳輸完成後會被取消選取.
sendModeHelp.multiple: 多次傳輸檔案到設備. 選中的檔案在傳輸完成後不會被取消選取.
sendModeHelp.link: 未安裝 LocalSend 的接收方可以透過瀏覽器打開連結來下載選中的檔案.
